calendar_empty_p1: You are either cuddling together right now, or you forgot the point!
calendar_empty_p2: The calendar displays the time from your cutie-patootie's departure date until their arrival date! Set it up in "Settings" :)
calendar_empty_p3: But if your sweetie-pie is right next to you, then come back when they aren't :(
first_launch_text_en:
Please choose your preferred language and set the main dates in the "Settings" section.

After configuring, make sure to press the "Save" button at the top of the settings page. üëâüëà
modal_unsaved_text: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save them before leaving?
